pages.text: aur imaan waalo aur nek amal karne waalo ko un jannato ki khush qabryaa do, jin ke niche nehre beh rahi hai, jab kabhi wo phalo ka rizkh diye jayenge aur hum-shakal laye jayenge to kahenge ye wahi hai jo hum is se pehle diye gaye thein, aur un ke liye biwiya hai saaf suthri aur wo un jannatho mein hamesha rehne wale hai

yaqinan Allah ta’ala kisi misaal ke bayaan karne se nahi sharmaata, qwaah macchar ki ho ya us se bhi halki cheez ki, imaan waale to ose apne rub ki jaanib se sahih samajhte hai aur kuffaar kehte hai ke is misaal se Allah ne kya muraad5 li hai? us ke zariye beshtar ko gumraah karta hai aur aksar logo ko raah raasth par laata hai aur gumraah to sirf faasiqo ko hee karta hai
jo log Allah ta’ala ke mazboath ehadh ko tod dete hai aur Allah tala ne jin chizo ke jodne ka hukm diya hai unhe kaat te aur zameen mein fasaad phailaate hai,yahi log nuqsaan uthaane waale hai
tum Allah ke saath kaise kufr karte ho? halaan ke tum murda thein us ne tumhe ko zinda kiya, phir tumhe masr dalega phir tumhe zinda karega, phir osi ki taraf lautaye jaoge
wo Allah jis ne tumhaare liye zameen ki tamaam cheezo ko paida kiya phir asmaan ki taraf qasd6 kiya aur un ko theek thaak saath asmaan banaaya aur wo har cheez ko jaanta hai
